tool_description: Need a dead-simple AWS API? Meet CloudMX. The one-stop API that treats AWS resources like a supermarket sweep!
name: Cloud APIs (cloudmx)
title: Cloud APIs (cloudmx)

api_list.name: API Health Check
api_list.description: Returns 200 if the API is working as expected.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cloud-apis-cloudmx.p.rapidapi.com/healthz"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cloud-apis-cloudmx.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cloud-apis-cloudmx.p.rapidapi.com/healthz"

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cloud-apis-cloudmx.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get VPC by Id
api_list.description: Returns a specific VPCs for a specified region, along with subnets

api_list.name: Get all VPCs
api_list.description: Returns a list of all VPCs for a specified region

        }

print(response.json())
